statements.title: Validity checking based on dates
statements.report_text: This section checks the validity dates
The `not_before` date is prior to right now
The `not_after` date is after right now

statements.title: Make sure the issuer is on our Trust List
statements.report_text: This section checks for valid issuers
The issuer is a test certificate
The issuer (Intermediate CA) is not trusted
This media asset is not signed with a trusted certificate.
